title: Remote Servers
description: Manage and control your remote BaluHost servers with SSH and VPN profiles

servers.title: Server Profiles
servers.description: Add and manage remote BaluHost servers

vpn.title: VPN Profiles
vpn.description: Upload and manage VPN configurations for secure connections

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.step1: Create a VPN Profile if you need secure access (optional)
quickStart.step2: Add a Server Profile with your SSH credentials
quickStart.step3: Test the connection to verify SSH access
quickStart.step4: Use "Start Server" to remotely power on your server
